title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 19.2 - Eligible claims
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 19.2 - Eligible claims

State Regulations

Claims eligible for payment pursuant to this Part are those
for damages resulting from tort and nontort causes of action more particularly
described in subdivisions 12, 12-a, 12-b, 12-c, 12-d, 12-e and 12-f of section
8
of the State

Finance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
19.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
